title: Big Court on His Early Criminal Life, Befriending Master P, Becoming a Youtuber & More
description:
BIG court shares about his fascinating story, from the streets, to fatherhood, to making it big with Youtube, his relationship with Master P and more!
-----
0:18 - Being inspired by Adam and happy to get into Youtube/podcasting. Learning how to clickbait
4:32 - Watching his friend accidentally shot and k*lled by another friend
20:50 - Court says “I’ve got friends with bodies. Damn near serial k*llers”
22:30 - Clout is a hell of a dr*g. People talking about their crimes online
31:07 - Master P was always a gangster. Became like an older brother to Court. Leveled up their music by introducing them to producers, equipment, studios, etc. 
32:28 - Adam asks if Master P ever asked him to “go to talk to somebody”
35:00 - Preparing to go to prison in late teens by buying property. Making money from music and hustling 
46:54 - Rappers need to understand that there is more money outside of music
1:05:55 - Court says DoKnow and AD need sensitivity training
1:16:59 - Beef with Wack100 after he accused Master P of being broke. Protecting legends in hip hop. 
1:20:42 - Problem with the social media platforms is that they reward negativity
1:36:12 - Not having malice towards anyone. Praying for everyone and preaching positivity.

-----
